title: Down and out in Boland Hills
review:
Paul Mullen (Brandon Auret) is an ex-cop down and out, hitchhiking along the road. He winds up at the estate of Bernard Russell (Graham Clarke) and is hired on. Bernard's daughter Lindsey (Anja Taljaard) has eyes on Paul as does Michelle (Amalia Uys), Bernard's young girlfriend and a former waitress. Things move along like sexual drama and then we get twists and then silly twists.

The film started out great. Anja Taljaard taking a shower is what the film really needed as well as a better ending.

Guide: F-word, sex, brief nudity (Amalia Uys)
